description.en-US: Enjoy a browser that’s configured with value-added features, when you install Flight Tab Pro & Custom Web Search. Check the status of almost any flight by entering route or airline details with this free extension. Find live flight status info using a free tool on your browser. What’s more? Enjoy a fresh web search experience from your browser! With instant access to Yahoo® search, you can find videos, news stories, maps, images & more conveniently. Your feedback is appreciated. We welcome your ideas and suggestions to improve this extension. Please note that you can uninstall the extension if you are dissatisfied with the product. Your add-on is using Yahoo® as a search provider. Clicking the above button confirms your agreement to install the extension and confirms that you abide by the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service of this extension. Disclaimer: Yahoo is a registered trademark of Apollo Global Management, Inc. Our Privacy Policy: flighttabpro.com is a product offered by Innover Group. We provide users with ease of access to information and widgets from their browser. Our Privacy Policy is important for us to continue providing the users with the best possible all-round experience. Here’s a summary of user data that our add-on collects and how we use this information: 1. IP address: We collect your IP address when you use the flight information related tool offered by our extension. We anonymise your IP address and do not trace it back to you. We only use this information for analytics and reporting purposes . You can opt-out of sharing the above information with us, however, you will only be able to access limited features. 2 Technical data: Technical information (such as domain name and user agent )is also collected by the add-on to plan product upgrades and help with fraud detection.. This data is not personally identifiable and is used for optimization purposes and cannot be used to identify users. 3. Information you explicitly share with us: We collect and process flight-related information that you provide while using the tools available on our extension to return relevant results. We may also collect information that you may choose to provide us (such as your name, telephone number and/or email address) if submitted by you as part of a feedback form, crash report, enhancement suggestion or other communication from you to us. This information is only used to respond to user queries or concerns and will not be shared with any third party. Privacy Policy: https://flighttabpro.com/flighttracker/privacypolicy_ff.html Terms of Service: https://flighttabpro.com/flighttracker/termsofservice_ff.html

name.en-US: Flight Tab Pro & Custom Web Search

summary.en-US: Install the Flight Tab Pro & Custom Web Search extension to track flight status & access flight info by clicking the favicon on the toolbar & enjoy Yahoo® search from your browser.
